backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control, allowing users to view and save their own profile while enforcing permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/diagnostics/pwa-notification-pe: Diagnosis explaining that notification features fail because no permission or service worker code exists.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, theming, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister caching rules specifying no-cache for certain generated PNGs and 24h cache for others.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Routes between onboarding and main app based on authentication state with a post-logout onboarding slide override.
frontend/src/components/icons/index.ts: Re-exports ThumbsUpIcon and ThumbsDownIcon for centralized icon imports.
frontend/src/components/icons/ThumbsDown: Inline SVG React component rendering a thumbs‑down icon with customizable className.
frontend/src/components/icons/ThumbsUpIc: React component rendering an SVG thumbs-up icon with optional className.
frontend/src/components/JournalSlideOutP: Slide-out panel showing weekly summary, history list with icons, and reset or logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingAutoAdva: Hook that auto-advances onboarding slides every 5 seconds with proper timer cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useRotatingPromiseSug: Cycles through preset motivational suggestions with timed fade animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup with custom fonts, color variables, animations, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Onboarding carousel with auto-advance, manual navigation, and Internet Identity login handling.
frontend/src/pages/Today.tsx: Main daily flow page handling promise creation, confirmation, reflection, storage interactions, and notification permission setup.
frontend/src/utils/journalHistoryStorage: Manages localStorage journal entries with per-day keys, updates, weekly filtering, sorting, and clearing.
frontend/src/utils/notificationPermissio: Controls when notification permissions are requested, guarding with a localStorage flag and retry logic.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingEntry.ts: Handles a session flag indicating whether to show the logged‑out onboarding screen after logout.
frontend/src/utils/outcomeMapping.ts: Defines reflection outcome types and mappings plus validation and normalization helpers.
frontend/src/utils/todayPromiseStorage.t: Stores, retrieves, and clears today's promise in localStorage with date validation.
frontend/src/utils/todayReflectionStorag: Stores and retrieves today's reflection using a 06:00 day‑reset boundary and localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/src/utils/weekUtils.ts: Provides week boundary calculations, day keys, reset-aware day keys, and date formatting.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography and animation extensions, and includes typography, container-query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, versioning, and feature list for the PWA including UI, onboarding, daily promise flow, rest mode, storage, and history features.
